design_philosophy: Minimally natural, clean aesthetic evoking introspection, growth, and elevated consciousness. Prioritizing visual balance, accessibility, and a sense of calm spaciousness.

primary.name: Serene Sky
primary.description: A soft, airy blue representing clarity and expanded perspective.

secondary.name: Earthy Dawn
secondary.description: A warm, gentle off-white/beige evoking natural light and grounding.

accent.name: Verdant Growth
accent.description: A muted, natural green symbolizing growth, balance, and vitality.

text.name: Deep Contemplation
text.description: A dark, grounding charcoal for readability.

background.name: Misty Horizon
background.description: A very light, almost imperceptible gray for a soft, neutral backdrop.

headings.description: A serif font that adds a touch of wisdom and classic elegance, suitable for titles and key statements.

body.description: A clean, highly readable sans-serif font ensuring accessibility and modern clarity for content.

captions.description: Lighter weight for secondary information, maintaining hierarchy.

logo_concept.name: The Ascending Seed
logo_concept.description: A minimalist icon combining a subtle upward curve (representing growth/ascent) with a small, grounded seed or sprout at its base. The lines are fluid and organic, rendered in the 'Verdant Growth' accent color against a soft background. It symbolizes potential, grounded beginnings, and the natural unfolding towards a higher state. It avoids sharp edges, favoring gentle curves.

ui_flow_concepts.name: Guided Inquiry Flow
ui_flow_concepts.description: Instead of rigid tasks, this flow presents users with gentle, open-ended 'Inquiries' or 'Reflections' (inspired by fizzlametta's meta-reflection). Each inquiry is presented on a spacious card with ample white space. Users can journal responses, select affirmations, or engage with short guided meditations. Navigation is non-linear, allowing users to explore related inquiries or revisit previous ones. The UI uses subtle animations to guide attention, like a gentle fade-in or a soft parallax scroll.
ui_flow_concepts.accessibility_notes: High contrast text, adjustable font sizes, keyboard navigation support, screen reader compatibility for all interactive elements.

ui_flow_concepts.name: Personalized Growth Path
ui_flow_concepts.description: Visualizes the 'Higher Self' journey not as a checklist, but as an evolving landscape or a branching tree. Users can mark moments of insight or practice. The interface uses soft gradients and organic shapes to represent progress. Instead of 'completing' steps, users 'cultivate' areas of their path. This acknowledges the non-linear and experiential nature of growth.
key_elements: Evolving visual landscape (e.g., a growing plant, a flowing river)
ui_flow_concepts.accessibility_notes: Ensure visual representations have textual alternatives. Color choices must maintain sufficient contrast. Interactive elements clearly indicated and navigable.

layout_principles: Generous use of white space (Misty Horizon)
Asymmetrical balance to feel organic and less rigid
Focus on natural imagery and textures (subtly integrated, e.g., background patterns)
Clear visual hierarchy using typography and color
Minimalist UI elements: soft-edged buttons, subtle icons
Responsive design ensuring optimal viewing across devices
accessibility_focus: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance as a baseline.
Sufficient color contrast ratios for all text and interactive elements.
Keyboard navigability for all interactive components.
Semantic HTML structure for screen reader compatibility.
Avoidance of purely color-based information conveyance.
